Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison and #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Halsted
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison & 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temp. rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Van Buren, Morgan, and Harrison due to, street blockage nr Harrison/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison and #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Halsted, Van Buren, Morgan, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Halsted.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
